definition.text: There's one more tool that you may find useful to manipulate spacetime! The native browser zoom function!

paragraphs.text: Sometimes you may wish to visualize larger sections of hierarchies than your screen allows.
Hit Ctrl and scroll the wheel of your mouse!

Chrome indicates the level of zoom on the top-right corner. When zooming in or out, the design space gets centered on the screen. After applying the desired level of zoom, use the design space map to go back where you were.
